name: The Path (itch) (Prestyn)
description:
The Path

The Waking has descended upon the world, raising undead Awoken to wreak havoc upon the living. Heroes venture forth, looking to find the source and end this chaos once and for all. But that is not your job.

You are a paladin of Valar, a holy warrior representing the god of purity. You have been sent to the town of Umbridge to restore its temple, which will protect the area with its divine magic. The only thing standing between you and the temple are countless enemies. Good thing you know how to fight. 

Text-Based Adventure - An entirely text-based RPG that plays right in your browser!

Darkness Everywhere - Discover the truth of a world destroyed by violence.

You Will Die - Death is not the end, but an opportunity to improve your abilities.

Please comment here if anything is broken! Game is free but any donation is appreciated!
